The Stuff of Dreams

29 March 2007

If you haven't seen Jeff Han's Multitouch Interface then you really, really should.

It's amazing, breathtaking, the stuff of dreams.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in London. See more of Paul's work or get in touch.
